metadata.Title: CVE-2020-11653 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - low.
metadata.Description: An issue was discovered in Varnish Cache before 6.0.6 LTS, 6.1.x and 6.2.x before 6.2.3, and 6.3.x before 6.3.2. It occurs when communication with a TLS termination proxy uses PROXY version 2. There can be an assertion failure and daemon restart, which causes a performance loss.

criterions.comment: varnish: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
